Detailed Description

class VVNeuron is the most fundamental unit of the network

This class is a friend of class VVLayer. It contains 3 protected variables:

Member Data Documentation

double VVNeuron::accumulate [protected]
 

double accumulate is the variable containing the value which is passed to the transfer function to obtain the state.

double VVNeuron::vvbias_weight [protected]
 

double vvbias_weight is the weight of the biased input if biasing is enabled.
